Client

YOGA.com is a worldwide yoga community that connects yoga instructors, nutritionist, coaches, psychologists and other experts with yoga enthusiasts.

Objective

Build web and mobile apps that integrated social functions while also delivering HD video content. The vendor needed to have expertise in developing apps for large and growing online communities.

Solution

Our team developed the backend APIs of the social network functionality for several web and mobile apps, including Аll-In-Fitness and Аll-In-Yoga. The apps were designed to allow users the ability to:

  • Upload photos
  • Like and comment
  • Follow influencers
  • Browse the most popular photos and videos
  • Organize in communities based on geo-location
  • Import photos from Instagram
  • Purchase video tutorials

Result

When it was published, the YOGA.com app series contained the largest database of yoga poses, with 289 poses and breathing exercises and 37 end-to-end programs. It has been installed over 1 million times and reached a rating of 4.1 in the app stores.
